about_the_game: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon. The Player is tasked with completing races across a number of tracks against other players or bots, As the player progresses in the game they will level up while earning Hallow Cores. Build your team of Hallowmon and race your way through the breathtaking world. It is essential to collect items & complete races to unlock your inner power that will aid you in becoming the best racer Costume Clash has ever seen.
